page.title: 15UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: The greatest cause of social concern in this area is unemployment, particularly amongst young people. Traditional industries like shipbuilding and mining have declined and new industries like engineering have failed to replace them. The current depression has made things worse and the apparent difference between north and south is resented. Those without a job often feel useless and inadequate, particularly if they have never had one. Boredom is a great problem amongst young people which sometimes leads to crime and vandalism. With the increase of leisure this is a problem which we must overcome in the future.
